arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic star returns to Liverpool and faces 'months, not weeks' on sidelines after suffering injury KO
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have been rocked with news on-loan Liverpool left-back Luke Chambers will be out for 'months, not weeks' with a back problem.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief slams first-half showing after Mansfield Town defeat - 'I was angry'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney blamed a poor first-half - which made him 'angry' - for Wigan Athletic's 2-1 home defeat to Mansfield Town.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 1 Mansfield Town 2: Aasgaard leveller in vain as Tics crash again
arts.sum: A superb equalising goal from Thelo Aasgaard couldn’t prevent Wigan Athletic losing for a second time in three days, as Mansfield Town ran out 2-1 winners at the Brick Community Stadium

arts.ttl: Keanu Baccus hits winner as Mansfield beat Wigan
arts.sum: Will Evans’ opener had been cancelled out by Wigan’s Thelo Asgaard.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Three changes in our expected team v Mansfield Town
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Mansfield Town

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief opens up on 'brilliant story' of K'Marni Miller
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admits K'Marni Miller's journey from non-league to Wigan Athletic's first team in the space of a month is a 'brilliant story'.

arts.ttl: Aasgaard back in: Wigan Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Mansfield Town
arts.sum: The latest Wigan Athletic team news as Shaun Maloney's side gear up to face Mansfield Town in League One. The post Aasgaard back in: Wigan Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Mansfield Town appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss rues touchline ban - and injury news ahead of Mansfield Town
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic boss Shaun Maloney admits he had no issue with his third booking of the campaign of the season at Cambridge on Saturday - and the accompanying touchline suspension.
